archimate:AssociationRelationship.name: Cooperation Value
archimate:AssociationRelationship.documentation: B2B: How interesting is the company as a cooperation partner? Are there real partnerships, or is the cooperation characterized by a customer-supplier relationship? If so, then it is more of an activity in the procurement market, but don’t make me believe in cooperation. G2B: Gov2Biz How interesting is the governmental agency as a cooperation partner? Are there real partnerships, or is the cooperation characterized by a customer-supplier relationship? If so, then it is more of an activity in the procurement market, but don’t make me believe in cooperation. EMBAG Opensource wants to transform customer-supplier to cooperation partnership
